gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all property keys associated with the project ABC to understand the custom configurations applied.
gold.ideal: The response should return a list of property keys for project ABC.

gold.user: As a developer, I need to delete the custom property 'customProperty' from project ABC to clean up unused configurations.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the deletion of 'customProperty' from project ABC.

gold.user: As a team lead, I want to check the value of the property 'customProperty' in project ABC to ensure it is set correctly.
gold.ideal: The response should return the value of 'customProperty' for project ABC.

gold.user: As a project administrator, I want to set the value of 'customProperty' for project ABC to 'newValue' to update the project settings.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm that 'customProperty' has been updated to 'newValue' for project ABC.
